resources.string:
Hi, my name is Benedikt. 

I love gaming. 

I usually play mostly on the console. 

I like games where every decision has its own consequence. 

But first-person shooters in multi-player mode against other players online are awesome too. 

An open world in single player games is really cool and make always fun. 

But also completely chaotic games where you only make shit can be very amusing. 

And if a game gets too boring as hell, then you can pimp it with modifications.
